translation.en: Dad, what are you doing?
translation.ja: パパ　何(なに)してるの？

translation.en: Oh, uh, just makin' a movie.
translation.ja: 記録(きろく)してるんだ

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: So we can remember. A day in the life.
translation.ja: 今日(きょう)という日(ひ)の記念(きねん)に

translation.en: This is awesome!
translation.ja: すごーい！

translation.en: What a day to remember!
translation.ja: 記念(きねん)の日(ひ)だ！

translation.en: The excitement was squishable
translation.ja: “すごい興奮(こうふん)だポヨ”

translation.en: as the entire garden gathered to witness an amazing feat.
translation.ja: “偉業(いぎょう)を見届(みとど)けようと みんなが集結(しゅうけつ)”

translation.en: An attempt to break the bug speed record.
translation.ja: “バグの最高記録(さいこうきろく)を 破(やぶ)れるのか”

translation.en: I love breaking stuff!
translation.ja: 破(やぶ)るの大好(だいす)き！

translation.en: Oh, with my, uh, custom- made cricktoracer,
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が作(つく)った クリックレーサーなら

translation.en: you should go faster than any bug has ever gone before!
translation.ja: どのバグよりも 早(はや)く走(はし)れるはずだよ

translation.en: Let's do this!
translation.ja: よし やるぞ！

translation.en: Talk us through what you're doing here, Crick, in laybug's terms.
translation.ja: 今(いま) 何(なに)をしてるのか バグ語(ご)で一言(ひとこと)

translation.en: Ah! Well, I've installed a warning light, uh, so when Jay reaches record- breaking speed,
translation.ja: ジェイが記録(きろく)を出(だ)すと ライトが光(ひか)るようにした

translation.en: it will, uh, flash and the cricktocamera will cricktomatically take a picture.
translation.ja: クリックカメラがクリっと 光(ひか)って写真(しゃしん)が撮(と)れる

translation.en: Enough talking! Time for Jaction! That's Jay plus action!
translation.ja: 話(はなし)はもういいよ “ジェイにお任(まか)せ”の時間(じかん)だ

translation.en: - - Kumi to Buzz. Kumi to Buzz.
translation.ja: クミからバズへ

translation.en: Kumi to Buzz, do you read?
translation.ja: バズ 聞(き)こえる？

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: きれーい！

translation.en: Kumi to Buzz, do you read?
translation.ja: 聞(き)こえる？

translation.en: Oh! Um, I'm learning to read. Does that count?
translation.ja: 今 練習中(いまれんしゅうちゅう)だけどいい？

translation.en: Sure, Buzz. Ah, Jay's about to go. Just checking that the coast is clear.
translation.ja: いいよ　ジェイが出発(しゅっぱつ)する 通路(つうろ)はどう？

translation.en: - Yes, the clear is coast! -
translation.ja: 通路(つうろ)が大丈夫( だいじょうぶ)！

translation.en: Okay, we are good to go!
translation.ja: 了解(りょうかい)！ 準備(じゅんび)オッケーよ

translation.en: Oh, my. I've got a bad feeling about this. I can't... I can't watch.
translation.ja: やだ　イヤな予感(よかん)がする 見(み)てられないわ

translation.en: Now to make sure that record stays broken!
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)にも破(やぶ)れない記録(きろく)にするぞ

translation.en: Um, Buzz to Kumi. Buzz to Kumi. The clear is not coast anymore!
translation.ja: バズからクミへ 通路(つうろ)が大丈夫(　だいじょうぶ)じゃない

translation.en: Uh, Buzz, what do you mean?
translation.ja: どういう意味(いみ)？

translation.en: - Jay! -
translation.ja: ジェイ！

translation.en: Jay! Are you okay?
translation.ja: ジェイ！ 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？

translation.en: I am, uh, more than okay.
translation.ja: 全然大丈夫(ぜんぜんだいじょうぶ)さ！

translation.en: I am awesome!
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)は超(ちょう)サイコーさ！

translation.en: Oh, Jay, are you okay?
translation.ja: ジェイ 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？

translation.en: Uh... Am I okay?
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が… 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)か？

translation.en: Uh, I'm gonna go with yes. I think.
translation.ja: きっと平気(へいき)… ああ たぶん

translation.en: Well, you did it, Jay. You broke the record.
translation.ja: 成功(せいこう)したよ ジェイ 記録(きろく)を破(やぶ)った！

translation.en: What an achievement!
translation.ja: すばらしい バグの最高記録(さいこうきろく)を打(う)ち破(やぶ)った

translation.en: The bug speed record smashed! How does it feel, Jay?
translation.ja: すばらしい バグの最高記録(さいこうきろく)を打(う)ち破(やぶ)った どんな気分(きぶん) ジェイ？

translation.en: Wait. What did I smash?
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が何(なに)を打(う)ち破(やぶ)った？

translation.en: Who is Jay? And, uh, who are all of you?
translation.ja: ジェイって誰(だれ)？ 君(きみ)たちは誰(だれ)？

translation.en: Uh, Dr. Robert, care to comment on Jay's memory loss?
translation.ja: ロバート先生(せんせい) 彼(かれ)の記憶喪失(きおくそうしつ)にコメントは？

translation.en: Well, uh, yes.
translation.ja: ジェイのどこが悪(わる)いか 判明(はんめい)した

translation.en: I've discovered what is wrong with Jay, and it is nothing.
translation.ja: ジェイのどこが悪(わる)いか 判明(はんめい)した 悪(わる)い所(ところ)は 何(なに)もない

translation.en: You heard it here first! It's... Wait. What?
translation.ja: 貴重(きちょう)な情報(じょうほう)だ…　え？

translation.en: At least nothing physically wrong.
translation.ja: 体(からだ)はどこも悪(わる)くない

translation.en: All we can really do is wait and hope his memory returns.
translation.ja: 記憶(きおく)が戻(もど)るのを待(ま)つしかない

translation.en: Oh, I beg to differ, Mr. Doctor.
translation.ja: 失礼(しつれい)ですが 先生(せんせい)…

translation.en: There is something we can do.
translation.ja: できることはあります

translation.en: Make sure the world reads all about it.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が報道(ほうどう)する

translation.en: There it is. The first edition of the Yardian newspaper.
translation.ja: できたぞ ヤーディアン新聞(しんぶん)の第(だい)１号(ごう)だ

translation.en: Hot off the presses!
translation.ja: すりたてだ

translation.en: Ugh. Hey, a simple no, thanks will do.
translation.ja: いらないなら そう言(い)えよ

translation.en: Oh, my. Poor Jay.
translation.ja: かわいそうなジェイ

translation.en: So I live here?
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)が… ここに… 住(す)んでる？

translation.en: You really don't remember, Jay?
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)に覚(おぼ)えてないの？

translation.en: Oh, you're talking to me? Sorry, Budge.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)に話(はな)しかけてる バッジ？

translation.en: My name is Buzz.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)はバズよ

translation.en: That's what I said. Budge.
translation.ja: そう言(い)った バッジ

translation.en: Surely, this will bring something back.
translation.ja: これに見覚(みおぼ)えはない？

translation.en: It's your skateboard. You do all sorts of, um, crazy tricks on it.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)のスケボーだ 君(きみ)はこれに乗(の)って すごいことやってた

translation.en: Uh, crazy like that?
translation.ja: こんな風(ふう)に？

translation.en: No, much crazier.
translation.ja: もっとすごいこと

translation.en: Jay, Jay, I know you're in there somewhere, old friend.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)の友達(ともだち)のジェイ その中(なか)にいるんだろ？

translation.en: If you can hear me, blink twice.
translation.ja: 聞(き)こえたら… ２回(かい)まばたきして

translation.en: Uh, but I can speak.
translation.ja: ２回(かい)まばたきして 話(はなし)はできるよ

translation.en: No, it's no use! He's gone for good!
translation.ja: もうダメだ ジェイはいなくなった！

translation.en: Look, I'm real sorry about your friend.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)の友達(ともだち)のことは残念(ざんねん)だ

translation.en: If I knew how to get him back, I would.
translation.ja: できることなら呼(よ)び戻(もど)すけど

translation.en: Oh, maybe she will know.
translation.ja: 彼女(かのじょ)に聞(き)こう

translation.en: Lucy!
translation.ja: ルーシー

translation.en: What in the world are you doing here?
translation.ja: ここで何(なに)してるの？

translation.en: - Well, I read your newspaper, Walter. -
translation.ja: あなたの新聞(しんぶん)を読(よ)んだわ

translation.en: Uh, are you sure that's me?
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)に僕(ぼく)なの？

translation.en: Ah! Of course, it's you. It's in the news, after all.
translation.ja: もちろんさ 新聞(しんぶん)にのってる

translation.en: Ah, I'm just a humble news slug.
translation.ja: たいした記事(きじ)じゃない

translation.en: I wanna help you, Jay.
translation.ja: 力(ちから)になるわ

translation.en: But these bugs have already tried everything.
translation.ja: このバグたちが全部試(ぜんぶため)したよ

translation.en: Maybe not everything.
translation.ja: 全部(ぜんぶ)じゃないわ

translation.en: This is where we begin.
translation.ja: ここから始(はじ)める

translation.en: All you need to do to restore your memory is go through a day in the life.
translation.ja: 記憶(きおく)を回復(かいふく)するには １日(にち)を過(す)ごせばいい

translation.en: Jay's life.
translation.ja: ジェイになって

translation.en: But that's the problem!
translation.ja: それはできない

translation.en: I don't remember what a Jay- day is.
translation.ja: “ジェイの１日(にち)”を 覚(おぼ)えてないから

translation.en: Oh, you don't, but they do.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らは覚(おぼ)えてる

translation.en: We will help you 'member us!
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちが手伝(てつだ)う

translation.en: Oh, uh, I guess it's worth a try!
translation.ja: じゃあ やってみるか

translation.en: Do you remember anything?
translation.ja: 思(おも)い出(だ)した？

translation.en: Did it work? Do you remember who you are?
translation.ja: どう？　思(おも)い出(だ)した？

translation.en: Uh, I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)は… その… ごめん　君(きみ)は誰(だれ)だっけ？

translation.en: Do I know you?
translation.ja: ごめん　君(きみ)は誰(だれ)だっけ？

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I've done all I can.
translation.ja: ごめんね 私(わたし)にできることはしたわ

translation.en: Let's sleep on it. He might be better in the morning.
translation.ja: 朝(あさ)になったら思(おも)い出(だ)すかも

translation.en: Good morning, bugs!
translation.ja: みんな おはよう

translation.en: - - You remember us?
translation.ja: 思(おも)え出(だ)した？

translation.en: Uh, it's, um, uh, Barbs, right?
translation.ja: 君(きみ)は… バッジだろ？

translation.en: Jay! Not again!
translation.ja: ジェイ またなの

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？

translation.en: Oh.  Yeah, Walter, just a bit of Jaction.
translation.ja: ああ ウォルター ジェイにお任(まか)せ

translation.en: He... He knows my name.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)の名前(なまえ)を呼(よ)んでくれた

translation.en: Sure. Why wouldn't I?
translation.ja: 当然(とうぜん)さ そうだろ

translation.en: And what exactly did you mean by, uh, Jaction?
translation.ja: “ジェイにお任(まか)せ”の 意味(いみ)は？

translation.en: You know, Jay plus action.
translation.ja: “ジェイ”と“お任(まか)せ”の 合体(がったい)さ

translation.en: Uh, bugs, did I miss something?
translation.ja: 何(なに)かあったの？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, um, you lost your memories when you broke the bug speed record.
translation.ja: 記憶(きおく)をなくしたの バグの最高記録(さいこうきろく)を破(やぶ)ったよ

translation.en: I did?
translation.ja: 本当(ほんとう)に？

translation.en: Wait, I broke the bug speed record?
translation.ja: バグの最高記録(さいこうきろく)を破(やぶ)ったの？

translation.en: You, uh, don't remember that?
translation.ja: 覚(おぼ)えてないの？

translation.en: Uh- uh. And you know what that means?
translation.ja: ということは…

translation.en: We have to do it all over again!
translation.ja: もう１度(ど)やろう！

translation.en: It's Jaction time!
translation.ja: “ジェイにお任(まか)せ”！

translation.en: Just another day in the life.
translation.ja: また新(あたら)しい１日(にち)ね

translation.en: Oh, battery's running out.
translation.ja: 充電(じゅうでん)が切(き)れる　コメントは？

translation.en: Any closing remarks, Julia? Something to remember this day by?
translation.ja: 充電(じゅうでん)が切(き)れる　コメントは？ 今日(きょう)の記念(きねん)に

translation.en: ♪ Love is all you need Love is all you need! ♪ ♪ Love is all you need... ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　藤井 幸子
